turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to place an order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three small gluten free pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small gluten free crust pizzas, all meatlovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $42, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Dining, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how big will your party be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll make sure there will be a table available, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'd be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
